MAN.TITLE: scipad
MAN.DESCRIPTION: Scipad is an embedded Scilab text editor written in TCL/TK. It can be started with the "Editor" menu or from Scilab command line with the instruction scipad() or scipad(f). It allows Windows like edition modes. The "Load Into Scilab" menu can be used to exec the file contents into Scilab.
MAN.BIBLIO: Scipad is derived from the tknotepad written by Joseph Acosta
MAN.AUTHOR: Mathieu Philippe, INRIA
